name: Randomattic Socialbookmarks
author: Ekta Paneri

sections.description:
Black & White Social networking icons that matches every layout of wordpress.
Easy to modify and flowless. More icon packs will be available soon.
The icons right now are courtesy of MySiteMyWay .
sections.installation:
1. extract the plugin zip file.
  2. Upload randomattic socialbookmarks folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Let the plugin add the code at the end of the post itself. ðŸ™‚
